title: WMIC
extract: WMIC is the abbreviation of Windows Management Interface Command, is a simple command prompt tool that returns information about the system you are running it on. WMIC extends WMI for operation from several command-line interfaces and through batch scripts.
extract_html: WMIC is the abbreviation of Windows Management Interface Command, is a simple command prompt tool that returns information about the system you are running it on. WMIC extends WMI for operation from several command-line interfaces and through batch scripts.
